ShortDescription.Value: This Pack adds 4 subway variations, consisting of different lengths

Publish.LongDescription:
## Subway Variation Asset Pack This Pack adds 4 single subway train variations in different lengths.
## New Assets - Subway Train (3 Segment) (cap. 390) - Subway Train (4 Segment) (cap. 540) - Subway Train (5 Segment) (cap. 690) - Subway Train (6 Segment) (cap. 840)
